meanings.definition: Showing or requiring great attention to detail; fussy or finicky.
meanings.sent1: The finiking artist spent hours perfecting every tiny brushstroke on the painting.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her finiking taste in home decor, always rearranging things to achieve perfection.
meanings.sent3: The finiking cat refused to eat her food unless it was served in a specific bowl.
meanings.sent4: Her finiking nature was like a magnifying glass, zooming in on every imperfection.
meanings.sent5: The finiking tailor meticulously sewed each stitch by hand, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To fuss over small details; to be overly concerned with trivial matters.
meanings.sent1: Stop finiking over the party decorations; no one will notice the difference.
meanings.sent2: She tends to finiking about her outfit for hours before any event.
meanings.sent3: The chef was finiking over the garnish, trying to get it just right.
meanings.sent4: He finiked over the wording of the email, making sure it conveyed the right tone.
meanings.sent5: The student finiked over the font choice for the project, wanting it to look perfect.
